title: Augmented Intelligence for Data Visualization Analytics
contributions: Collaborated with engineers to create an AR/MR user experience, empowering them to make data-driven decisions through an app to visualize sales trends and a chatbot for data visualization.
overview: The concept of "Augmented Intelligence" is a great example of how we can make data more accessible. The project was conceived to achieve data democratization by making it easier for all employeesâ€”not just data expertsâ€”to find insights in large datasets. To achieve this, the project uses Mixed Reality, Augmented Reality, and Virtual Assistants to make interacting with and understanding data more intuitive and user-friendly.

title: Representation of geographical data related to the Venezuelan Petroleum Industry by using Keyhole Markup Language
contributions: Worked alongside geologists and geographers to improve the accessibility and usability of geographical data for the Venezuelan petroleum industry; by automatically creating and editing KML/KMZ files.
overview: The project's central focus was to make complex geographical data from the Venezuelan petroleum industryâ€”such as geological formations, oil fields, and infrastructureâ€”more accessible and user-friendly for a wider audience. The main challenge was that this data was likely stored in specialized formats that required specific, often expensive, software like ArcGIS to view.

title: Integrated System of Opportunity Portfolios (SIPO)
contribute_as: Product Software Engineer Â· Data Engineering
contributions: Partnered with a team of engineers, economists, geologists, and geographers in creating and launching a real-time web application to facilitate economic scenario analysis and effectively visualize both geoscience and financial data.
overview: The Integrated System of Opportunity Portfolios (SIPO) is a web-based information system for the oil business. It provides reliable, real-time information to eliminate redundancy and support decision-making. SIPO is also a hybrid web application that combines two open-source products: Fusion-Charts Free for displaying analysis charts in economic simulations and the Google Earth API for incorporating new geographic and geoscience data.
